name: Bury Your Dead
description: '''Bury Your Dead''' is an American [[metalcore]] band from [[Boston, Massachusetts]], formed in 2001. The current lineup is guitarist Chris Towning, lead vocalist Mat Bruso, drummer Mark Castillo, and bassist Aaron Patrick. To date, they have had eight releases: one EP (''Bury Your Dead''), one live DVD (''Alive''), and six studio albums (''[[You Had Me at Hello (album)|You Had Me at Hello]]'', ''[[Cover Your Tracks (Bury Your Dead album)|Cover Your Tracks]]'', ''[[Beauty and the Breakdown]]'', ''[[Bury Your Dead (Album)|Bury Your Dead]]'', ''[[It's Nothing Personal]]'' and ''[[Mosh N' Roll]]'').
